Title: Blood Bath
Writer: Ryan Murphy (created by), Brad Falchuk (created by), Ryan Murphy, John J. Gray (story), Crystal Liu (staff writer), Todd Kubrak (script coordinator)
Actors: Sarah Paulson, Evan Peters, Michael Chiklis, Frances Conroy
Plot: The freaks mourn the death of one of their own, while Elsa welcomes a new performer. Penny and her new friends get revenge on her father.
